questions.question: How are you ?
questions.answer: I am fine . What about you ?

questions.question: I am good . Tell me something about the current situation in IT field
questions.answer: ndia has a rapidly growing IT industry, and as of 2021, it is one of the leading destinations for outsourcing IT services in the world. The industry is driven by a large pool of highly skilled professionals, a supportive government, and a favorable business environment.

questions.question: Can you tell me about your favourite hobby ?
questions.answer: I love to cook and listen music
